description: This cocktail is perfect for Christmas time and will make your guests feel like they're at a&nbsp;holiday party. This recipe includes ingredients that are not too strong but can still pack a punch. The sweetness in this drink comes from the crushed candy cane rim on the glass.
name: Candy Cane Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: Finely crush the candy cane on a small plate or saucer and coat the rim of the glass with it.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, combine the ingredients and shake until well combined.
